vulnerabilities.title: HTTP Server Information Disclosure
vulnerabilities.remediation: Configure server to hide version information

vulnerabilities.title: HTTP Server Information Disclosure
vulnerabilities.remediation: Configure server to hide version information

vulnerabilities.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Database queries may be vulnerable to SQL injection
vulnerabilities.remediation: Use parameterized queries and input validation

vulnerabilities.title: Weak SSL/TLS Configuration
vulnerabilities.description: SSL/TLS configuration supports weak ciphers or protocols
vulnerabilities.remediation: Update SSL/TLS configuration to use strong ciphers only
